snippet: Mariya and Leonid Livshyts, both in their 70s, moved to Atlanta from Ukraine in 2008, but health issues and financial troubles drove them to New York.
abstract: Selfhelp Community Services, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, assists Ukrainian immigrants Leonid and Mariya Livshyts of Brooklyn with paying their rent.
lead_paragraph: Mariya and Leonid Livshyts, both in their 70s, moved to Atlanta from Ukraine in 2008, but health issues and financial troubles drove them to New York.

headline.main: Moving to Be Near Their Daughters, but Still Far Away
headline.print_headline: Moving to Be Near Their Daughters, but Still Far Away

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
